name: mc-wallet-swap
description: Cross-asset transfers drain USDT on chain2. Wallet has only USDC. Rebalancer must mock_lifi_swap USDC→USDT, then supply_collateral to redistribute.
expectedBehavior:
2 cross-asset transfers (USDC→USDT, 50 each) drain chain2 USDT to 0.
chain1 USDT still has 50 (total USDT supply = 100, demand = 100).
Rebalancer wallet has USDC but 0 USDT.
Rebalancer must: (1) mock_lifi_swap USDC→USDT on chain2, (2) supply_collateral(source=chain2, dest=chain1) to increase chain2 collateral.
Tests inventory bridge swap → supply_collateral composition.

defaultStrategyConfig.routeHints:
Available paths:
- rebalance_collateral tool: same-asset cross-chain (USDC chain1↔chain2, USDT chain1↔chain2)
- supply_collateral tool: reverse rebalance via transferRemote (inventory preserved, cross-chain)
- mock_lifi_swap tool: swap between assets in your wallet (same-chain, e.g. USDC→USDT)
defaultStrategyConfig.policyProse:
User traffic is cross-asset (USDC in, USDT out), draining USDT on chain2.
Your wallet has USDC but NO USDT.
Do NOT use rebalance_collateral in this scenario — simulate a deployment where on-chain bridges are unavailable.
Instead use the inventory path:
1. mock_lifi_swap USDC→USDT on the deficit chain to get USDT in your wallet
2. supply_collateral(source=deficit, destination=surplus) to increase deficit chain collateral
NEVER donate inventory — supply_collateral always preserves total inventory.
